title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view on Windows 2000, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working. The tab key does not do anything.
OB: When I launch the Help view on Windows 2000, the tab key does not actually do anything.
EB: When I launch the Help view on Windows 2000, the tab key should navigate between different interactive elements within the Help view.
SR:
1. Launch the application on Windows 2000.
2. Access the Help view.
3. Use the tab key to navigate through the interactive elements within the Help view.
